description.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"At the gateway to The Grove and the new Millionaire’s Row.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Where the picturesque streets of The Grove begin and tree-lined 27th Avenue runs down to the Bay, glasshaus stands as an iconic, elegant counterpart to the gleaming high-rise towers now lining the waterfront.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Walk to Everything.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The marinas and bayside parks are just down 27th Avenue. The village shops, restaurants and movies are just to the right.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-5","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"\nThe private entrance to glasshaus is tucked away on Center Street, a shady lane in the heart of the Grove.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"From here you walk to your favorite restaurants and cafes, theaters and art galleries. A few blocks away you can dock your boat at famous Dinner Key Marina or the Coconut Grove Sailing Club — where every glasshaus owner is welcomed.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-5","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"An elegant canvas for your own decorating style.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"From your skyline-view balcony to the elegantly-designed kitchen, the Great Room of your home is your showcase. The typical 40-foot expanse is where you’ll create, dine, entertain and just kick-back, ensconced in your personal expression of perfection.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
